text: Captain from Castile is a 1947 American historical adventure movie directed by Henry King and based on the 1945 novel of the same name by Samuel Shellabarger. It stars Tyrone Power, Jean Peters, Cesar Romero and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1947 movies Category:1940s adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Henry King Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Captain from Castile
